vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μελχισεδέκ indecl., ὁ (Heb. מַלְכִּי־צֶדֶק),
Melchizedek: Heb.5:6, 10 6:20 7:1, 10-11 7:15, 17.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.14.18
§ Melchizedek, "[my] king is Zedek [just]"
Melchisedek, (Proper name), indeclinable, Heb. 5:6, 10; 6:20; 7:1, 10f., 15, 17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
麥基洗德 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "公義之王"
亞伯拉罕時代的人, 是撒冷的王及至高神的祭司
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
麦基洗德 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "公义之王"
亚伯拉罕时代的人, 是撒冷的王及至高神的祭司
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Mên-chi-xê-đéc « Vua sự công bình », Vua của Sa-lem (Giê-ru-sa-lem) và thầy tế lễ của Đức Chúa Trời Chí cao. H4442
